import React,{useState} from 'react' import {useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; function UpdateBooks({books}) { const [isAuthenticated, setIsAuthenticated] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const[author,setAuthor]=useState(books.author) const[title,setTitle]=useState(books.title) const[description,setDescription]=useState(b) const[category,setCategory]=useState("") const[trending,setTrending]=useState() const[coverImage,setCoverImage]=useState("") const[Price,setPrice]=useState("") const[createdAt,setCreatedAt]=useState("") const updatebooks=(id,obj)=>{ console.log(id) const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); axios.put(`http://localhost:4000/api/book/update/${id}`,obj,{ headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` } }) .then(()=>{ console.log("books added") if (token) { setIsAuthenticated(true); fetch(); navigate("/main") } }).catch((error)=>{ throw error }) } return (
